Package com.openclassrooms.tourguide.controller

Class TourGuideController

java.lang.Object
com.openclassrooms.tourguide.controller.TourGuideController
@RestController public class TourGuideController extends Object
The Api controller.

Call DtoService to get responses of all endpoints.

    • index

      @RequestMapping("/") public String index()
      Method to manage the home page.
      Returns:
      the home page.

    • getLocation

      @RequestMapping("/getLocation") public UserLocationDto getLocation(@RequestParam String userName)
      Method to manage the /getLocation?userName endPoint.

      Call the userLocationGenerator to parse the current location of the user.

      Parameters:
      userName - the parameter parsed to get the current user.
      Returns:
      the UserLocationDto object.
      See Also:
      • DtoService.userLocationGenerator(String)

    • getNearbyAttractions

      @RequestMapping("/getNearbyAttractions") public NearAttractionsListDto getNearbyAttractions(@RequestParam String userName)
      Method to manage the /getNearbyByAttractions?userName endPoint.

      Call the nearAttractionsListGenerator method to get the NearAttractionsListDto who contains the fives closest attractions.

      Parameters:
      userName - the parameter parsed to get the current user.
      Returns:
      the NearAttractionsListDto object.
      See Also:
      • DtoService.nearAttractionsListGenerator(String)

    • getRewards

      @RequestMapping("/getRewards") public UserRewardsDto getRewards(@RequestParam String userName)
      Method to manage the /getRewards?userName endPoint.

      Call the UserRewardsListGenerator method to get the UserRewardsDto who contains the userId and all UserRewards.

      Parameters:
      userName - the parameter parsed to get the current user.
      Returns:
      the UserRewardsDto object.
      See Also:
      • DtoService.UserRewardsListGenerator(String)

    • getTripDeals

      @RequestMapping("/getTripDeals") public TripDealsDto getTripDeals(@RequestParam String userName)
      Method to manage the /TripDeals?userName endPoint.

      Call the TripDealListGenerator method to get the fives latest Trip and the userId of the user parsed.

      Parameters:
      userName - the user parsed to get latest trips.
      Returns:
      the TripDealsDto object.
      See Also:
      • DtoService.TripDealListGenerator(String)
